name: ng-set-state
description: Library that helps developing angular components in a more functional style where UI logic is representing as a series of morphisms of immutable states.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && rollup -c && npm run cp_publish
scripts.build_for_demo: npm run build && npm run cp_publish_to_demo
scripts.cp_publish: rimraf tmp_publish && cpx "./dist/**/*.*" tmp_publish/dist && cpx "./{package.json,LICENSE,CHANGELOG.md,README_NPM.md}" tmp_publish  && node -e "require('fs').rename('tmp_publish/README_NPM.md', 'tmp_publish/README.md', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); })"

author: Dmitry Tikhonov
